Dari Sepang, Jenazah Afridza Munandar Telah Tiba di indonesia
04 Nov 2019, 16:38 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Jenazah pebalap motor muda Indonesia, Afridza Munandar tiba di Terminal 3 Bandara Internasional Soekarno-Hatta, Jakarta Senin (4/11/2019). Jenazah Afridza selanjutnya dibawa ke Tasikmalaya untuk dimakamkan.
Afridza mengalami kecelakaan hebat dalam balapan pertama Idemitsu Asia Talent Cup (IATC), yang digelar di Sirkuit Sepang, Malaysia, Sabtu (2/11/2019), sebagai kelas pendukung MotoGP. Ia terjatuh di Tikungan 10 pada lap pembuka.
Usai insiden itu terjadi, Afridza mendapat pertolongan pertama dari petugas medis di tepi trek, dan kemudian segera ditransfer ke Rumah Sakit Kuala Lumpur dengan helikopter. Sayangnya, nyawa rider berusia 20 tahun itu tak tertolong.
Jenazah Afridza tiba di Bandara Soetta hari ini pada pukul 14.00 WIB, dengan menumpang pesawat Garuda Indonesia GA-821 ETD dari Malaysia. Sang paman, Bayu Aditya jadi pihak keluarga yang menjemput jenazah Afridza.
text:
From Sepang, the body of Afridza Munandar has arrived in Indonesia
Nov 04 2019, 16:38 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The body of a young Indonesian motor racer, Afridza Munandar arrived at Terminal 3 of Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, Jakarta on Monday (11/04/2019). Afridza's body was later taken to Tasikmalaya to be buried.
Afridza suffered a major accident in the first race of the Idemitsu Asia Talent Cup (IATC), which was held at the Sepang Circuit, Malaysia, Saturday (11/02/2019), as a class supporting MotoGP. He fell in Bend 10 on the opening lap.
After the incident happened, Afridza got first aid from a medical officer on the edge of the track, and then was immediately transferred to Kuala Lumpur Hospital by helicopter. Unfortunately, the life of a 20-year-old rider was beyond help.
Afridza's body arrived at Soetta Airport today at 14.00 WIB, aboard a Garuda Indonesia GA-821 ETD flight from Malaysia. The uncle, Bayu Aditya, was the family who picked up Afridza's body.
